video_prompt: Glowing particles and light ribbons cascade dynamically from a celestial burst. Two figures slowly turn their heads upwards, gazing in awe. Haze undulates, shifting through the impressive, ancient-futuristic chamber as light pulsates from crystals on the debris-strewn ground.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** A dramatic, high-contrast, low-angle digital painting in portrait orientation, depicting a vast, cylindrical ancient/futuristic chamber. A powerful, electric blue starburst light source at the top, resembling a geometric compass rose, emanates glowing particles and a swirling light ribbon. Dark, intricately patterned stone/metal walls with vertical pipes rise. Two explorers with backpacks stand on rugged ground with debris, glowing blue and orange crystals, and human skulls, looking up. Hazy atmosphere, cool blue and warm orange palette. Discovery, mystery, awe.
refined_video_prompt: Glowing particles and light ribbons pour and swirl, expanding dynamically from a radiant burst. Two figures slowly turn their heads upwards, their expressions gradually shifting to profound awe. Haze undulates and drifts, altering the chamber's perceived depth, while light pulsates from crystals, causing nearby shadows to flicker and move across surfaces.
